title: Daily Pranayama under 15-Minutes | Breathing Exercises & Yoga | Saurabh Bothra

Ever Wondered How Just Breathing Can Transform Your Health?
Welcome to a journey of calm and clarity with our Pranayam follow-along video! Pranayam, the art of breath control, is not just an ancient practice; it’s a pathway to enhancing your physical, mental, and spiritual well-being. In today’s session, I will guide you through a series of breathing exercises that promise to improve your lung capacity, reduce stress, and heighten your overall energy levels. Join me as we explore techniques that have been practiced for centuries to bring balance and peace to practitioners. This video is designed not only for those who are new to Pranayam but also for those looking to deepen their existing practice. Whether you're looking to start your day with a burst of freshness or to unwind after a long day, this session is perfect for you. Remember, the quality of your breath reflects the quality of your life. So, let’s breathe better to live better! Tune in now and don’t forget to subscribe and hit the bell icon to stay updated on all our latest videos. Share your progress and experiences in the comments below as we breathe our way to a healthier life together!

#pranayama #breathing #healthylifestyle

About Habuild

HABUILD, is a technology-enabled platform that makes building sustainable habits simple, practical, and fun. 👈🏻 The platform helps people adopt a healthy lifestyle 🥗 by cultivating good habits such as 🧘🏻‍♂Yoga by promoting physical and mental well-being. Join us on your journey towards a balanced life. 💪🌱

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About The Host

Saurabh Bothra is a government-certified yoga trainer, an IIT-ian, and a Co-Founder of HaBuild. His mission is to inspire a healthier life, using the transformative power of yoga and habit-building. Through this channel, we aim to unleash the most prominent health secrets in easy-to-implement ways that help you stick to your habits and eventually achieve your fitness goals.
